Package spec.mcrl2obj

Class MCRL2

java.lang.Object
spec.mcrl2obj.MCRL2
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISpec
public class MCRL2
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISpec
This is the MCRL2 class that defines an object describing a mCRL2 specification
Author:
S. Belluccini
